row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
Write-Host Creating new VPC..
:SET &UC4RB_TENANCY_OPTION# = '' :IF &UC4RB_AWS_TENANCY# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_TENANCY_OPTION# = '--tenancy &UC4RB_AWS_TENANCY#' :ENDIF
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-create-vpc.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_AWS_IP_BLOCK# &UC4RB_TENANCY_OPTION#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^VPC -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to create new VPC $error = [string]::join("`n", $output) Write-Host $error exit 1 }
Write-Host $result Write-Host "`nSuccessfully create VPC"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process:
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "VPC*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1)
! Extract the delimiter character from this output_line, usually the tab character : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 4, 1)
! Cut the VPC from the string output_line : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 5) ! Replace all tab characters with single space : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : DEFINE &results#, string, 5 : FILL &results#[] = STR_SPLIT(&output_line#, " ")
: SET &UC4RB_OUT_VPC_ID# = &results#[1] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_IP_BLOCK# = &results#[2] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_STATE# = &results#[3] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_DHCP_ID# = &results#[4] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_TENANCY# = &results#[5]
: PRINT VPC ID = &UC4RB_OUT_VPC_ID# : PRINT CIDR block of the VPC = &UC4RB_OUT_IP_BLOCK# : PRINT Current state of the VPC = &UC4RB_OUT_STATE# : PRINT The ID of the DHCP options associated with the VPC = &UC4RB_OUT_DHCP_ID# : PRINT The supported tenancy options for instances launched into the VPC = &UC4RB_OUT_TENANCY#
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_VPC_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_IP_BLOCK#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_STATE#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_DHCP_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_TENANCY#, , "WORKFLOW"
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
